summary: Create a website for the shop "Beniwal Music Center" featuring information about tractor music systems, tractor modification materials, electrical mechanic services, and contact details (more info to be added later).
architectural_notes: Support replacing the site favicon/website icon with a user-provided image (with minor visual enhancements).
Allow flexible placement of user-provided images across site sections to improve visual appeal.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Enhance and crop for a square brand icon with improved contrast/sharpness (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 2.51.23 AM (2).jpeg > bmc-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Create favicon (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 2.51.23 AM (2).jpeg > favicon-32.dim_32x32.png)
- Create Apple touch icon (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 2.51.23 AM (2).jpeg > apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
- Create optimized hero background image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 2.51.21 AM (2).jpeg > hero-photo.dim_1600x900.jpg)
- Create optimized section image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 2.51.21 AM (1).jpeg > music-systems-photo.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Create optimized section image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 2.51.22 AM.jpeg > speaker-box-photo.dim_1200x800.jpg)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive website titled “Beniwal Music Center” with a clear home/landing section that introduces the shop and summarizes the main offerings.
Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Music Systems” describing the products/services offered (informational content only; no checkout required).
Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Modification Materials” and include messaging that the materials are available at reasonable prices.
Add a dedicated section describing “Electrical Mechanic Services” and clearly state that an electrical mechanic is available.
Add a “Contact” section with contact information fields that can be filled in later (use clear placeholders such as phone number, address, and business hours).
Add simple navigation (e.g., header links) to jump to: Home, Tractor Music Systems, Tractor Modification Materials, Electrical Mechanic Services, and Contact.
Apply a cohesive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and section styling) suitable for a tractor/automotive shop brand; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add generated static image assets (logo + hero banner) to the site and store them under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Add the 12 uploaded images as optimized static assets and place them throughout the existing single-page site to make it more visually attractive (hero + relevant service sections), using responsive layouts (grid/cards) and ensuring images are cropped appropriately for mobile and desktop.

Replace the website icon (favicon) with an enhanced version derived from the user-selected uploaded image (the Beniwal Music Center / Beniwal Music Stereo signboard image), and update the header/footer logo to match the new branding image where appropriate.

After the visual updates are complete, add a clear on-page prompt in the Contact section asking the site owner to provide contact information (phone number, address, and business hours) so the placeholders can be replaced later (English text).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website titled "Beniwal Music Center"
Add a home page describing the shop and its offerings
Add a section for tractor music systems products/services
Add a section for tractor modification materials (reasonable price messaging)
Add a section describing electrical mechanic availability/services
Use uploaded images to make the website more attractive by placing them appropriately across relevant sections
Change/update the website icon (favicon) using the user-selected image with minor enhancements to make it more attractive
After completing the visual updates, prompt the user to provide contact information to fill in the Contact section
